card.name: Bobbery, Salty Sea Dog
card.text: Whenever a source you control deals excess noncombat damage to a creature you don't control, Bobbery deals twice that much damage to that creature's controller. Bomb — {3}{R}: Bobbery deals 2 damage to target creature you don't control.

card.name: 3-Up Moon
card.text: Return each creature card with mana value 3 or less and up to one Hero or Noble card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile this spell.

card.name: Reserve Box
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice an Aura, return up to one target Aura card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Double Cherries
card.text: Enchant creature Enchant creature has myriad. Those tokens aren't legendary. Power-up (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, remove all damage from it and sacrifice this Aura instead.)

card.name: Lava Moat Blargg
card.text: Trample When this creature enters, each opponent sacrifices an artifact of their choice. Then this creature deals 3 damage to each opponent, plus an additional 3 damage to each opponent who didn't sacrifice an artifact with mana value 3 or greater this way.

card.name: Captive Peach
card.text: Captive Peach enters under the control of an opponent of your choice. Captive Peach can't attack or block. Whenever a creature attacks you, untap it. It gains menace until end of turn. {5}, Sacrifice Captive Peach: Her owner draws a card and creates two Treasure tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Yoshi Kid
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Yoshi Kid enters or attacks, choose a kind of counter at random that this creature doesn't have on it from among first strike, menace, reach, and trample. Put a counter of that kind on Yoshi Kid. If he has a counter of each of those kinds on him, put two +1/+1 counters on him instead.

card.name: Kooper, Power Shell
card.text: Vigilance Kooper enters with a shield counter on him. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.) When Kooper enters, put a shield counter on each other modified creature you control. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Watt, Baby Spark
card.text: Whenever another legendary creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Watt. As long as Watt has three or more counters on her, she has first strike As long as Watt has six or more counters on her, she has double strike.

card.name: Lakilester, Cool Cloud Rider
card.text: Flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to other attacking creatures you control. At the beginning of each end step, if damage was prevented this turn, create two 1/1 red Turtle Egg creature tokens with "This token can't block"

card.name: Turtle Egg SMC
card.text: This token can't block.

card.name: Tippi, Helpful Pixl
card.text: Flying Whenever Tippi or another legendary permanent you control enters, you gain 1 life and draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Mallow, Lost Prince
card.text: Reach Whenever you sacrifice an enchantment, Mallow deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life. {2}{R}{G}, Sacrifice an Aura with mana value 1 or greater: Discover X, where X is that Aura's mana value. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Geno, Star-Powered Puppet
card.text: Haste Shooting Star Shot — Whenever Geno attacks for the first time each turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Then if you control three or more attacking enchanted creatures, untap all attacking creatures. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Mario, Superstar
card.text: Whenever Mario attacks, create a tapped Treasure token for each Aura attached to him. Partner—Cross Heroes (You can have two commanders if both have this ability.)

card.name: Luigi, Second Banana
card.text: Whenever an Aura enters attached to Luigi, you may create a token that's a copy of it attached to another target legendary creature you control. Partner—Cross Heroes (You can have two commanders if both have this ability.)

card.name: Bowser, King Koopa
card.text: Trample Minions you control have trample and haste. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 2/1 red Robot Minion artifact creature token. Partner—Cross Villains (You can have two commanders if both have this ability.)

card.name: Duck Hunt Duo
card.text: Flying Clay Shooting — Whenever one or more commanders you control attack, Duck Hunt Duo deals 2 damage to each defending player. Create a Treasure token for each player dealt damage this way. Partner—Cross Heroes (You can have two commanders if both have this ability.)

card.name: Vivian, Shadow Sister
card.text: Veil — At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. Fiery Hex — During your turn, double all damage commanders you control would deal to your opponents and to permanents your opponents control.

card.name: Ganondorf, Evil King
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice a nontoken creature Whenever Ganondorf attacks, exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card except it's a Spirit Minion in addition to its other types and it has flying. Partner—Cross Villains (You can have two commanders if both have this ability.)

card.name: The Fabled Giga Bell
card.text: Enchant legendary creature you control Auras you control have hexproof and indestructible. Enchanted creature gets +10/+10 and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Bowser's Chance Time
card.text: Each player rolls two six-sided dice. For each opponent, Bowser's Chance Time deals damage to that player equal to the difference between the total of their results and the total of your results. If less than 3 damage is dealt to that player this way, you create X Treasure tokens, where X is 3 minus the amount of damage dealt to that player.

card.name: The Koopalings, Mean Mob
card.text: Flying, menace At the beginning of your end step, each opponent who lost life this turn faces a villainous choice — That player loses 4 life and discards a card at random, or each of your other opponents loses 4 life and you draw a card.

card.name: Kamek, Chief Magikoopa
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a spell that shares a creature type with your commander, you surveil 1 and Kamek deals 1 damage to each opponent. If that spell is your commander, instead you surveil 3 and Kamek deals 3 damage to each opponent. Partner—Cross Villains (You can have two commanders if both have this ability.)

card.name: Super Princess Peach
card.text: As Super Princess Peach enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose one. Peach and each enchanted creature you control have the last chosen ability. • Joy — Flying • Rage — First strike • Gloom — Deathtouch • Calm — Lifelink

card.name: Prince Peasley, Flamboyant Bean
card.text: Flying Untap each enchanted permanent you control during each opponent's untap step. Whenever you attack, for each defending player, tap target creature that player controls.

card.name: Castle Bunny
card.text: When this creature enters, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Peach's Blessing
card.text: Whenever you attack, create a Super token attached to target attacking creature you control and scry 1. (A Super token is a colorless Aura enchantment with enchant creature and "Enchanted creature gets +1/+1." To scry, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Princess Peach, Toadstool Ruler
card.text: Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. When Princess Peach enters, return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Toad, Mushroom Steward
card.text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Toad enters, you may return another permanent you control and all Auras attached to that permanent to their owner's hand.

card.name: Circuit Statues
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) As long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn, this creature can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: E. Gadd, Nutty Professor
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast noncreature spells. {2}{U}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.

card.name: Luigi, Best Bro
card.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Luigi enters, draw three cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Luigi's Determination
card.text: Return one or two target artifact, instant, and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Luigi's Determination.

card.name: Biddybud Battalion
card.text: Expendable 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 black Minion creature token with "This token can't block.") When this creature dies, you lose 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Bowser, Monstrous King
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you gain 1 life and create a 1/1 black Minion creature token with "This token can't block."

card.name: Bowser's Brutality
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller exiles a card from their hand and loses 2 life.

card.name: Wonder Bowser Jr.
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Mario's Courage
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has double strike. (That creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) {3}{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Princess Daisy, Tomboy Biker
card.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Whenever Princess Daisy becomes tapped, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Red Yoshi
card.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to defending player.

card.name: Super Mario
card.text: During your turn, Mario has flying. (He can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Mario enters or attacks, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Treasures you control have "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add two mana of any one color."

card.name: Diddy Kong, Best Buddy
card.text: As long as you control another legendary creature, Diddy Kong has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Diddy Kong.

card.name: DK, Gorilla Great
card.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) Whenever DK attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on him and up to one other target creature you control.

card.name: DK's Jungle Beatdown
card.text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. Double the number of +1/+1 counters on the creature you control, then it deals damage equal to its power to the creature you don't control.

card.name: Rhino Pal
card.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Whenever another creature you control enters, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
